data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Xinyu, Jiangxi, China to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Xinyu, Jiangxi, China

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Xinyu.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Xinyu. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Xinyu, Jiangxi, China.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Paiwanese people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Paiwanese people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Paiwanese people is yours.
Spirit, guide seekers in Xinyu, Jiangxi, China to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the county of Xinyu a passion to plant another simple church.

data.section_summary:
the county of Xinyu, Jiangxi, China has a population of 1,140,000.

We estimate Xinyu has 86,482 people who might know Jesus, 18,417 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,035,102 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 86,482 believers in Xinyu, Jiangxi, China how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.
